languages.text: Громоздкое устройство, чей дух машины неустанно ткет защитный покров силового поля. Похоже, что оно сдерживает натиск ксеносов, но его неровное мерцание заставляет задуматься — надолго ли?

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Громоздкое устройство генерирующее силовое поле. Похоже, оно может остановить некронов от проникновения за него, неизвестно только на какой срок.

languages.text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.
languages.original_text: Громоздкое устройство, чей дух машины неустанно ткет защитный покров силового поля. Похоже, что оно сдерживает натиск ксеносов, но его неровное мерцание заставляет задуматься — надолго ли?

traits.locale_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

languages.text: 这台庞大的装置不断生成着保护力场，肯定就是这道力场将那些异形挡在了外面。然而力场的光芒并不稳定，不禁令人怀疑它还能坚持多久。
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

traits.locale_text: 这台庞大的装置不断生成着保护力场，肯定就是这道力场将那些异形挡在了外面。然而力场的光芒并不稳定，不禁令人怀疑它还能坚持多久。

languages.text: 巨大な装置の機械精霊が防護フィールドを張り巡らしている。このおかげで異種族を食い止めているのだろう。しかしバリアが不安定に揺らめく様を見ると、バリアがあとどれくらい持つのかを疑問に思わざるを得ない。
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

traits.locale_text: 巨大な装置の機械精霊が防護フィールドを張り巡らしている。このおかげで異種族を食い止めているのだろう。しかしバリアが不安定に揺らめく様を見ると、バリアがあとどれくらい持つのかを疑問に思わざるを得ない。

languages.text: Un appareil imposant, dont l'esprit de la machine tisse en continu un champ de force protecteur. Cela doit être ce qui maintient les xénos à distance, mais d'après ses clignotements instables, on peut supposer que la barrière ne tiendra plus longtemps.
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

traits.locale_text: Un appareil imposant, dont l'esprit de la machine tisse en continu un champ de force protecteur. Cela doit être ce qui maintient les xénos à distance, mais d'après ses clignotements instables, on peut supposer que la barrière ne tiendra plus longtemps.

languages.text: El espíritu máquina de este dispositivo voluminoso está continuamente creando un campo de fuerza protector. Debe de ser lo que mantiene al xenos a raya, pero a juzgar por su irregular parpadeo, es inevitable preguntarse cuánto tiempo resistirá esta barrera.
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

traits.locale_text: El espíritu máquina de este dispositivo voluminoso está continuamente creando un campo de fuerza protector. Debe de ser lo que mantiene al xenos a raya, pero a juzgar por su irregular parpadeo, es inevitable preguntarse cuánto tiempo resistirá esta barrera.

languages.text: Ein klobiges Gerät, dessen Maschinengeist kontinuierlich ein schützendes Kraftfeld erzeugt. Dieses Gerät muss die Xenos in Schach halten, aber angesichts seines unsteten Flackerns muss man sich fragen, wie lange diese Barriere wohl noch halten wird.
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.

traits.locale_text: Ein klobiges Gerät, dessen Maschinengeist kontinuierlich ein schützendes Kraftfeld erzeugt. Dieses Gerät muss die Xenos in Schach halten, aber angesichts seines unsteten Flackerns muss man sich fragen, wie lange diese Barriere wohl noch halten wird.

languages.text: Makine ruhu; sürekli koruyucu bir güç perdesi yayan, büyük bir cihaz. Zenoları kontrol altında tutan şey bu olmalı ama dengesiz bir şekilde yanıp sönen ışıklarına bakılırsa bariyeri pek de uzun süre dayanmayacak gibi duruyor.
languages.original_text: A bulky device whose machine spirit is continuously weaving a protective force field. This must be what is holding the xenos at bay, but looking at its unsteady flickering, one cannot help but wonder how long this barrier will last.
